title: Beauty on Bowen! 1st flr, hdwd flrs, EIK, 2c Parking- 3D tour!
posting_body: Convenient living on a pretty tree lined street.
Quoted rental rate is for 2 people occupying with no animals and includes 2 car driveway parking.
Open living and dining rooms layout
Steps to restaurants and conveniences and minutes to new Green line, Route 93 , Route 16 and Assembly Row
Tenant pays first month, full security and 1/2 month broker fee
Quoted rate is for up to 2 people
Only small caged or tanked pets will be considered.
Qualifications include a gross household income in excess of $87,000, Good Credit, and Good References.
View a 3D tour on this and all our active rental inventory at <URL>

If you believe you have experienced discrimination, contact the Boston Fair Housing Commission at 617-635-2500 or www.cityofboston.gov/fairhousing/fairhousing.
We have No Fee, 1/2 Fee and Full Fee rentals.
We are seeking prospective tenants with Good Credit.
Property does go under agreement quickly and may no longer be available when you call or the owner may have adjusted the price or terms.
